Good game, but just one question. Is this release with a fix for the multiplayer? Because a lot of people could not launch it properly, and it all resulted in an error message. 
Thank you.
You fucking idiots should know by know that a cracked game can't play MP!
@Deathtrooper: Are you kidding me? Some people are so idiotic that they Pirate a game and then want to play it online making it easier for games companies to catch them.
can i play skirmish with this release? the P2P version has a smaller size (only 3.2GB) but you cant play skirmish with ai controlled oponents, has anyone tried this yet?
@mad_joe: yes you can. i couldn't play via Private. but you can host your own game with AI in Local.
